product.name: EnviDAS Ultimate: Versions prior to v1.0.0.5

notes.text: The web application lacks proper authentication which could allow an attacker to view information and modify settings or execute code remotely.CVE-2017-9625 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 8.2 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:L/A:N).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Envitech Ltd., recommends that users of affected versions update to the latest version of v1.0.0.5 or newer. The update can be obtained by contacting Envitech Ltd., support at the following email: mailto:david.farhi@envitech.co.il
